message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of optimal coding of a partially observed Markov process, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses structural results and decentralized (multi-terminal) setups, which are relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and control systems (cs.SY). The use of i.i.d. and Markov sources suggests a connection to probability theory and stochastic processes, which are relevant to mathematical analysis (cs.MA) and data structures (cs.DS).
